member.name: WS_EXCEPTION_CODE
member.summary: The structured exception codes thrown by this component. These exceptions are fatal and should not be handled by the application.

member.name: WS_EXCEPTION_CODE.WS_EXCEPTION_CODE_USAGE_FAILURE
member.summary: This exception occurs to indicate that usage of the web services component has violated the API contract.

member.name: WS_EXCEPTION_CODE.WS_EXCEPTION_CODE_INTERNAL_FAILURE
member.summary: This exception occurs to indicate that an internal error occurred in the web services component.
